pitch.cc: A.J. Burnett showed faith in Francisco Cervelli by throwing that knuckle curve in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
That was pitch number 45 for A.J. Burnett; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .263 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .296 off him after that.
